tool_description: An API that spreads awareness for poverty by showing the latest news and articles regarding poverty around the world
name: povertyawarness
title: povertyawarness

api_list.name: Poverty Awareness News
api_list.description: The endpoint shows all the news regarding poverty from all over the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://povertyawarness.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "povertyawarness.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://povertyawarness.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "povertyawarness.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
